plot: Ships that are trying to cross the Blue Amazon, are mysteriously disappearing. What will happens when a navy's captain, Kauan and his best friend Piau, travels to the Blue Amazon to solve that mystery.
title: Kauan e a Lenda das Águas
plot_es: Ships that are trying to cross the Blue Amazon, are mysteriously disappearing. What will happens when a navy's captain, Kauan and his best friend Piau, travels to the Blue Amazon to solve that mystery.
original_name: Kauan e a Lenda das Águas
plot_en: Ships that are trying to cross the Blue Amazon, are mysteriously disappearing. What will happens when a navy's captain, Kauan and his best friend Piau, travels to the Blue Amazon to solve that mystery.
